00023 /* This file contains prototypes for system dependent API
00024    from the RSTP to an operation system */
00025   
00026 #ifndef _STP_OUT_H__
00027 #define _STP_OUT_H__
00028 
00029 /* In the best case: clean all Learning entries with
00030  the vlan_id and the port (if 'exclude'=0) or for all ports,
00031  exclude the port (if ''exclude'=1). If 'port'=0, delete all
00032  entries with the vlan_id, don't care to 'exclude'  */
00033 //tolua_begin
00034 typedef enum {
00035   LT_FLASH_ALL_PORTS_EXCLUDE_THIS,
00036   LT_FLASH_ONLY_THE_PORT
00037 } LT_FLASH_TYPE_T;
00038 //tolua_end
00039 
00040 #ifdef USELUA
00041 #include "rstp_bridge.h"
00042 #define STP_OUT_flush_lt(rstp, port, vid, typ, reason)  rstp->flush_fdb(port, vid, typ, reason)
00043 #define STP_OUT_get_port_mac(rstp, port, mac)           rstp->get_mac(port, mac)
00044 #define STP_OUT_get_port_oper_speed(rstp, port)         rstp->get_speed(port)
00045 #define STP_OUT_get_port_link_status(rstp, port)        rstp->get_linkstatus(port)
00046 #define STP_OUT_get_duplex(rstp, port)                  rstp->get_duplex(port)
00047 #define STP_OUT_set_learning(rstp, port, vid, ena)      rstp->set_learning(port, vid, ena)
00048 #define STP_OUT_set_forwarding(rstp, port, vid, ena)    rstp->set_forwarding(port, vid, ena)
00049 #define STP_OUT_set_port_state(rstp, port, vid, state)   rstp->set_portstate(port, vid, state)
00050 #define STP_OUT_tx_bpdu(rstp, port, vid, bpdu, len)     rstp->tx_bpdu(port, vid, bpdu, len)
00051 #define STP_OUT_get_port_name(rstp, port)               rstp->get_portname(port)
00052 #define STP_OUT_get_init_port_pathcost(rstp, port)      rstp->get_init_port_pathcost(port)
00053 #define STP_OUT_get_init_stpm_cfg(rstp, vid, cfg)       rstp->get_init_stpm_cfg(vid, cfg)
00054 #define STP_OUT_get_init_port_cfg(rstp, port, vid, cfg) rstp->get_init_port_cfg(port, vid, cfg)
00055 #define STP_OUT_set_hardware_mode(rstp, vid, mode)      rstp->set_hardware_mode(vid, mode)
00056 #else
00057 int STP_OUT_flush_lt (IN int port_index, IN int vlan_id,
00058                       IN LT_FLASH_TYPE_T type, IN char* reason);
00059 
00060 /* for bridge id calculation */
00061 void STP_OUT_get_port_mac (IN int port_index, OUT unsigned char* mac);
00062 unsigned long STP_OUT_get_port_oper_speed (IN unsigned int portNo);
00063 /* 1- Up, 0- Down */
00064 int STP_OUT_get_port_link_status (IN rstp_bridge *rstp, IN int port_index);
00065 /* 1- Full, 0- Half */
00066 int STP_OUT_get_duplex (IN int port_index);
00067 
00068 #ifdef STRONGLY_SPEC_802_1W
00069 int STP_OUT_set_learning (IN int port_index, IN int vlan_id, IN int enable);
00070 int STP_OUT_set_forwarding (IN int port_index, IN int vlan_id, IN int enable);
00071 #else
00072 /*
00073  * In many kinds of hardware the state of ports may
00074  * be changed with another method
00075  */
00076 int STP_OUT_set_port_state (IN int port_index, IN int vlan_id, IN RSTP_PORT_STATE state);
00077 #endif
00078 
00079 int STP_OUT_set_hardware_mode (int vlan_id, UID_STP_MODE_T mode);
00080 int STP_OUT_tx_bpdu (IN int port_index, IN rstp_bridge *rstp, int vlan_id,
00081                      IN unsigned char* bpdu,
00082                      IN size_t bpdu_len);
00083 const char *STP_OUT_get_port_name (IN int port_index);
00084 int STP_OUT_get_init_stpm_cfg (IN int vlan_id,
00085                                INOUT UID_STP_CFG_T* cfg);
00086 int STP_OUT_get_init_port_cfg (IN rstp_bridge *rstp, int vlan_id,
00087                                IN int port_index,
00088                                INOUT UID_STP_PORT_CFG_T* cfg);
00089 #endif
00090 #endif /* _STP_OUT_H__ */
